EmailTemplate.name: Labs_Event_TechTalks_Q314.Registration Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Registration Confirmation - Tech Talks at Pivotal Labs HQ - July 30, 6 p.m.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=}},
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Tech Talk at Pivotal Labs HQ on July 30 from 6 p.m. - 8 p.m. PDT.
Event details are below. To add this event to your calendar, click here.
Topic: Grow, Don't Break: How to Scale a Software Team
Date: Wednesday, July 30, 2014
Time: 6 p.m. - 8 p.m. PDT
Location: Pivotal Labs, 875 Howard Street, San Francisco, CA
If you have any questions prior to the session, please reply to this email.
Regards,
The Pivotal Labs team
